mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT M.MEM_NAME,M.MEM_HP1,M.MEM_HP2,M.MEM_HP3,M.MEM_EMAIL1,M.MEM_EMAIL2,D.DEPT_NAME,P.POS_NAME FROM MEMBER M JOIN POSITION P ON M.POS_NO=P.POS_NO JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON M.DEPT_NO=D.DEPT_NO WHERE D.DEPT_NAME=#{deptName} ORDER BY D.DEPT_NO DESC )A )
